title: Dunkey quits League of Legends forever
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VjzgbZL12VI

He does bring up good points, like getting banned for responding negatively to a troll player. He got banned for his words to a feeding malphite, and the malphite probably is still playing the game because Riot doesn't care that idiots ruin games as long as they don't cuss at their team. 

AFKs and trolls are a major issue and cause more problems and headaches in game than some kid saying the F-word to his team, yet Riot only focuses on chat because it's easier to prove that someone used naughty words in all chat than a player intentionally feeding during a match. There's also the issue of games starting when they clearly shouldn't because a player is only at 20% load; but clearly some guy telling his team to fuck off is a bigger problem than starting a losing match because you're down one player.
